name: John Doe
title: Software Engineer

about.summary: Experienced software engineer with a passion for developing innovative programs that expedite the efficiency and effectiveness of organizational success.

projects.name: Project One
projects.description: A web application that allows users to track their tasks using React and Node.js.

projects.name: Project Two
projects.description: A mobile app built with React Native and <mark>Firebase</mark> that helps users manage their finances.

experience.responsibilities: Lead a team of 5 engineers to develop scalable web applications using React. Implemented new features and optimized existing ones using Node.js and MongoDB.

Working at NatWest as a front end engineer focusing mostly on a corporate banking product called Bankline. Working as part of a scrum team consisting of 5 developers, 2 testers and a PO/BA. The front end is a React app that talks to an API built using a collection of Java microservices. I have spent time working in multiple parts of the stack including helping to define our front end architecture to follow best practices to implementing PDF and CSV export in a microservice.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Studied computer science and software engineering. Completed courses in algorithms, data structures, software design, and database management.

afterHours: I enjoy playing guitar and reading science fiction novels.
